title: It Is the Devil, Bearing beneath His Two Wings the Seven Deadly Sins (C'est le diable, portant sous ses deux ailes les sept péchés capitaux) from The Temptation of Saint Anthony (La Tentation de Saint-Antoine)
medium: Lithograph on chine appliqué from a portfolio of 11 lithographs (including cover, ten on chine appliqué)
credits: Gift of Abby Aldrich Rockefeller (by exchange)
